name: Trigger Happy (OneSmallBoy)
description:
Trigger Happy was made during the  third BlackThornProd Game Jam with the given theme of "less is more". It was developed in the Godot Engine and was developed solo with the help of B.Nuttall for music. Trigger Happy is a side-on arena based game where you destroy turrets and aim to get the most points possible before dying.

Art, sound effects and code by OneSmallBoy
